Uses of Class
chess.Board

Packages that use Board 
Package Description
chess
General classes with define and orchestrate the game of chess.

  • Uses of Board in chess

    Fields in chess declared as Board 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Board Chess.CurrentBoard
    Stores the game's chess Board
    Board Piece.ParentBoard
    The chess Board that the Piece is stored in
    Methods in chess that return Board 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Board Board.getCopy()
    Creates a copy of this board via serialization.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Board 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Piece.setBoard​(int x, int y, Board ParentBoard)
    Sets this Piece's ParentBoard to the provided Board for reference Sets the ParentBoard's yth xth indexical position to reference this Piece Sets this Piece's internal position to that of the ParentBoard
